T04nagysk_u:1: gambhīras tair nirālambaḥ pratyayārtho vibhāvyate || NagYsk_01
T04nagysk_u:3: na saṃsāraṃ na nirvāṇaṃ manyante tattvadarśinaḥ || NagYsk_05
T04nagysk_u:4: nirvāṇaṃ ca bhavaś caiva dvayam etan na vidyate |
T04nagysk_u:5: parajñānaṃ bhavasyaiva nirvāṇam iti kathyate || NagYsk_06
T04nagysk_u:6: tat tat prāpya yad utpannaṃ notpannaṃ tat svabhāvataḥ |
T04nagysk_u:7: svabhāvena yan notpannam utpannaṃ nāma tat katham || NagYsk_19
T04nagysk_u:10: mamety aham iti proktaṃ yathā kāryavaśāj jinaiḥ |
T04nagysk_u:13: tajjñāne vagamaṃ yāti nanu mithyā vikalpitam || NagYsk_34
T04nagysk_u:14: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yasya sthitir na pratyayair vinā |
T04nagysk_u:15: vigamaḥ pratyayābhāvāt so 'stīty avagataḥ katham || NagYsk_39
T04nagysk_u:17: vivādās tatsamutthāś ca bhāvābhyupagame sati || NagYsk_46
T04nagysk_u:18: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kleśotpattir na taṃ vinā |
T04nagysk_u:21: pratītya jātaṃ cājātam āha tattvavidāṃ varaḥ || NagYsk_48
T04nagysk_u:22: bālāḥ sajjanti rūpeṣu vairāgyaṃ yānti madhyamāḥ |
